methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.content: Fund flows are aggregated from 3.1M procurement contracts (2002-2025). Bar colors reflect the average v5.0 risk score for each flow: green (<10%), amber (10-30%), orange (30-50%), and red (>=50%). High-risk flow value sums all flows where average risk exceeds 30%. Use year and sector filters to narrow the analysis. Clicking a row in the high-risk table navigates to the contracts page filtered by that institution-vendor relationship.
